About Us

Blush Queen was created, because we believe every girl or woman should feel like a queen.

We saw the price of quality make-up excluded many classes of ladies and we thought this was criminal.

Thus, we created Blush Queen, because all ladies should look and feel like Queens, at a price they can afford.

Talk to Us

Send us a message or ask any question you have regarding our product and we will get back to you as soon as we receive it :)
